tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE WrestlerRankings (
    wrestler_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    wrestler_name VARCHAR(255),
    matches_won INT,
    matches_lost INT,
    matches_drawn INT,
    popularity_score DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE WrestlerRankings (
    wrestler_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    wrestler_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    match_wins INT DEFAULT 0,
    match_losses INT DEFAULT 0,
    popularity_rating FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE Wrestlers (
    wrestler_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    wrestler_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    wrestler_age INT,
    wrestler_position VARCHAR(50),
    wrestler_nationality VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Matches (
    match_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    match_date DATE NOT NULL,
    match_location VARCHAR(50),
    winner_id INT,
    loser_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE wrestlers (
    wrestler_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    debut_date DATE,
    matches_won INT,
    matches_lost INT,
    total_matches INT,
    active BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE matches (
    match_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    match_date DATE,
    venue VARCHAR(255),
    winner_id UUID,
    loser_id UUID,
    duration_min INT
);

CREATE TABLE rankings (
    ranking_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    wrestler_id UUID,
    promotion_id UUID,
    rank_order INT,
    rank_date DATE
);
